title: 393: “The Kardashians” Show Recap & Their Aura Readings!
itunes:title: 393: “The Kardashians” Show Recap & Their Aura Readings!
description:
Today The Broads are diving into their thoughts and recap of the Kardashian’s new show and then they are joined by Mystic Michaela for a Kardashian aura reading (plus an updated personal reading)!

 

MYSTIC MICHAELA:

Follow Michaela on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/mysticmichaela/ 

Listen to her podcast here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/know-your-aura-with-mystic-michaela/id1477126939 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***KETTLE AND FIRE: Go to KETTLEANDFIRE.COM and use code CHATTY for 20% off!

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/CHATTY16 and use code CHATTY16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts!

***FEALS: Go to FEALS.COM/CHATTY to get 50% off your first order with free shipping! 

***FAVOR: Go to HEYFAVOR.COM/CHATTY - Favor is offering a $10 donation to bedsider.org to every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a patient!

***FIRSTLEAF WINE CLUB: Get your first 6 bottles for $29.95 plus free shipping at TRYFIRSTLEAF.COM/CHATTY

***BLENDERS EYEWEAR: Get 15% off at BLENDERSEYEWEAR.COM with promo code CHATTYVIP
